properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
All the earth
proclaim the Lord,
sing your praise to God.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Serve you Lord,
heart filled with gladness,
come into his presence
singing for joy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Know that the Lord
is our Creator.
Yes he is our Father,
we are his sons.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We are the sheep
of his green pasture,
for we are his people,
he is our God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Enter his gates
bringing thanksgiving,
oh enter his courts
while singing his praise.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Our Lord is good,
his love is enduring,
his word is abiding now
with all men.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Honour and praise be
to the Father,
the Son and the Spirit
world without end.
